tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct top(browserMajorVersion,10),count(*) as "Count" FROM usersession where browserMajorVersion is not null

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct useraction.name as "User Action", count(*) as "Requests", CONDITION(count(*), where useraction.isEntryAction=true) as "Entry Count", CONDITION(count(*), where useraction.isExitAction=true) as "Exit Count", CONDITION(COUNT(*), where usersession.bounce=true) as "Bounce Count", avg(duration) as "Duration" FROM useraction where name is not null

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct useraction.matchingConversionGoals as "Conversion Goals",count(*) as "Count" FROM useraction where useraction.matchingConversionGoals IS NOT NULL

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct top(stringproperties.connectivitytype,10),count(*) as "Count" FROM usersession where stringproperties.connectivitytype is not null

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct top(stringProperties.isguestpurchase,10),count(*) as "Count" FROM usersession where stringProperties.isguestpurchase is not null

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct top(stringProperties.paymenttype,10),count(*) as "Count" FROM usersession where stringProperties.paymenttype is not null

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct top(stringProperties.productpurchased,10),count(*) as "Count" FROM usersession where stringProperties.productpurchased is not null

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(*) as " " from usersession where userSessionId is not null

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(*) as " " from usersession where userType="REAL_USER"

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(*) as " " from usersession where newUser=true

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select count(*) as " " from usersession where userActionCount=1

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select sum(totalErrorCount) as " " from usersession where userSessionId is not null

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select avg(useraction.duration) as " " from usersession where userSessionId IS NOT NULL

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select avg(usersession.duration) as " " from usersession where userSessionId IS NOT NULL

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select avg(useraction.visuallyCompleteTime) as " " from usersession where userSessionId IS NOT NULL

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct top(usersession.stringProperties.airline,10),avg(visuallyCompleteTime) as "Visually Complete" FROM useraction where usersession.stringProperties.airline IS NOT NULL

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct top(usersession.stringProperties.airline,10),avg(duration) as "Duration" FROM useraction where usersession.stringProperties.airline IS NOT NULL

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct top(usersession.stringProperties.airline,10),count(usersession.totalErrorCount) as "Count" FROM useraction where usersession.stringProperties.airline IS NOT NULL

tiles.name: User Sessions Query
tiles.query: select distinct top(usersession.stringProperties.airline,10),count(*) as "Count" FROM useraction where usersession.stringProperties.airline IS NOT NULL
